ygData.subject: RE: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, like that idea.  Even thought that would most likely make a mage tank as stated before (but is a Cleric Tank legal too then?).  Think you will have to go
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, like that idea. Even thought that would most likely make a mage tank
as stated before (but is a Cleric Tank legal too then?). Think you will
have to go to the equipment item base, the real question is how hard are the
quest going to be, like finding a Mammoth tusk, which I don't think anyone
has found in South K yet (which has been reported as a rare spawn).

*Rant Start* -> sorry

Although I would like the remove disease spell, had rabies once (attacking
mummy) and 2 ppl group with me. The didn't know what happened, I went
unconscious, they killed it (while I was unconscious), and with no healing
(and nothing attacking me) I didn't die. With them being fairly new level
(7 or 8) and not knowing what was going on, I just sat for 90 minutes on
line unconscious eating bandwidth.... didn't make me happy (went and watched
TV for 90 minutes). I know this would not have helped me in this case since
I was unconscious, but it would be nice. Oh, and to add salt to the wound
they ungrouped with me and let me sit.

(Brian) Could you talk to your programmers and if you are unconscious with
rabies take 1 hp away every 60 seconds or so. I would have rather just died
than sit their like that for 90 minutes.

*Rant End* -> again sorry

David
Tenin - Dark Elf SK - 16th lvl

-----Original Message-----
From: rich.hitz@... [mailto:rich.hitz@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 3:19 PM
To: Shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Another suggestion


From: rich.hitz@...

<snip>
Why not ty this instead... make the SK into an Anti-
Paladin (which we are supposed to be really). Reverse
all cleric spells that heal for a Paladin and give that
to an SK as DD along with all the buffs that a Paladin
normally gets. After all we are not healers, but we are
the strong arm of evil and are to protect our kind with
the gifts of our dark gods.
<snip>
